name: caromax syrup F+G
description: caromax syrup F+G is a unique premium quality carob syrup. It is obtained from the best quality carob pods growing in the south of Spain by an innovative natural proprietary manufacturing process. It has a sweet flavor and a light golden color. It has been specially designed for its use in all possible applications, such as bakery or dairy products as a potent edulcorate. Its content in pinitol makes this product a unique natural alternative to control blood glucose and glucose metabolism. Besides, there are clinical and preclinical researches that indicate that syrup F+G may impact numerous neurotransmitters involved in mood, anxiety and alertness.
